communityGuidelines.insert: Treat others with kindness and respect.
Share relevant food-related posts like food experiences, recipes, cooking tips, and restaurant recommendations.
Avoid excessive self-promotion or irrelevant content.
Always credit original sources and avoid plagiarism.
Keep the community friendly and free from offensive or inappropriate posts.
Offer helpful feedback and advice to support others.
Don't post copyrighted material without permission.
Share accurate information and avoid spreading false claims.
Alert moderators of any violations or inappropriate posts.
Enjoy your time, inspire others, and encourage a love for food.
